text: Hi all, I’m creating an app to use webhooks, but I’m getting an error with the redirect_url. I provide in my server an endpoint to that, but it’s throwing an 404 error there. Somebody has like an example or something on how to do this?

Hey all, I have a question about workflows. I created one that sends an internal email notification based on conditional user interaction with a form. However, I do not know how to include the form submission data inside the body of that internal email notification? If it's not possible, can someone suggest a workaround? Thanks in advance!
I just wanna delete this section :sob:
The forms are filling properties. You can then use them through personalisation in the email, I think.
YES! I have been having the same issues!
On that note, Brian did react with "SOON" on my message here, which should resolve this issue hopefully: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1645738980548849>
Agreed, this is an accessibility nightmare.
Hey everyone - Quick Question - is there any other way to create or invite users to a HubSpot hub other than via a manual creation or CSV upload? Any API pathing to create users?
<@UATE4ATHP> try hiding the section above it and then try again
I just refreshed and it worked
